articles.author: Leslie Josephs
articles.title: American Airlines scraps traditional frequent flyer award chart in dynamic pricing shift - CNBC
articles.description: Starting Wednesday, American will publish starting levels for how many frequent flyer miles are likely required to redeem for a ticket in certain regions.
articles.content: American Airlines is getting rid of its traditional frequent flyer award chart as the carrier moves toward dynamic pricing for mileage redemptions, the latest shift in its lucrative AAdvantage loyalt… [+1799 chars]

articles.author: Aaron Kliegman
articles.title: North Carolina lawmaker officially leaves Dems for GOP, says turning point was American flag criticism - Fox News
articles.description: A lawmaker in North Carolina announced she's leaving the Democratic Party and becoming a Republican, giving the GOP a veto-proof majority in the state legislature.
articles.content:
A lawmaker in North Carolina announced Wednesday that she's leaving the Democratic Party and becoming a Republican, giving the GOP a veto-proof majority in the state legislature.
